Class PixelPanel

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PixelPanel
extends Panel
    Class that is used to paint and edit pixels of an image easily.

    Feb 27, 2013 at 6:12:19 PM, v0.1

      • fillRect

        public void fillRect(int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int color)
        Method that fills the integer pixel array with a rectangle at the specified location with the specified size and color.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location to fill the rectangle.
        y - The y location to fill the rectangle.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.
        color - The color of the rectangle.
